mapper.sql: select s.id as model_id, s.model_name, s.project_id, s.owner_id, s.is_deleted, s.created_time as model_created_time, s.modified_time as model_modified_time, u.id as user_id, u.user_name, u.created_time as user_created_time, u.user_enabled, p.project_name from model_info as s, user_info as u, project_info as p where s.is_deleted = 0 and u.id = s.owner_id and p.id = s.project_id
mapper.insert: insert into model_info(model_name, project_id, owner_id) values(#{entity.modelName}, #{entity.projectId}, #{entity.ownerId})
mapper.select: select id as model_id, model_name, project_id, owner_id, is_deleted, created_time as runtime_created_time, modified_time as runtime_modified_time from model_info where is_deleted = 1 and id = #{id}
